result.name: 2010-defra-mb0102-2c-distribution-of-seagrass-beds-from-polygon-data-in-the-united-kingdom-and-2
result.notes: This layer shows the distribution of polygon records of seagrass beds, a Biodiversity Action Plan Habitat. This layer forms one of a set of data layers created for the Defra MB0102 contract. This work will support the delivery of a network of Marine Protected Areas as required to meet existing international and national obligations and commitments, including Marine Conservation Zones (MCZs), a new measure to be delivered as part of the Marine and Coastal Access Bill, and equivalent measures under Scottish legislation. The availability of these data layers will also be of importance in underpinning Marine Planning (e.g. licensing) in our marine area.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: 2010 Defra MB0102 2C Distribution of Seagrass beds (from polygon data) in the United Kingdom and Isle of Man

extras.value: ["Full resolution GIS layer only for viewing by MB0102 partners with publicly available layers available at 10km resolution."]

["Full resolution data layer for use only within the MB0102 contract. Permission required from data originators for use in any other context, or by non MB0102 partners. 10km resolution data layer freely available under Open Government Licence."]
Marine Biological Association of the UK (MBA) (originator); Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (DEFRA) (custodian)
